ygData.subject: Re: Recon vs. Angel Prime
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually hitting Angel Prime s punching hand or his kicking leg or whatever is fine, because that s blocking, and he can even say he pushed Angel Prime away,

Actually hitting Angel Prime's punching hand or his kicking leg or 
whatever is fine, because that's blocking, and he can even say he 
pushed Angel Prime away, its just up to you to say how Angel Prime 
reacts to being pushed.

The easiest thing here is to lay off and quit complaining about 
everything. Johnny is new, and he's getting alot better at RPGing, so 
give him time.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., icedemon101@h... wrote:
> [ok you ignored my post about angel prime attempting to hit you. 
Then 
> you moded by saying you hit Angel Prime away. YOU CAN'T POST DAMAGE 
> FOR OTHER PEOPLE. talking about moding you are the only one moding.]
> 
> 
> 
> Angel PRime 
>
